name: R.Mika
title: The Wrestling Idol
subtitle: A charismatic wrestler who combines showmanship with devastating power
lore: A professional wrestler who brings the excitement and energy of the ring to every battle. R.Mika's combination of crowd-pleasing performance and powerful wrestling techniques makes her a formidable opponent. Her ability to rally allies and control enemies through sheer force of personality is as impressive as her physical prowess.

passive.name: Crowd Pleaser
passive.description: Every time R. Mika lands a crowd control ability, she gains a stack of "Hype" up to 5 stacks. Each stack increases her [7%] damage reduction. When she reaches 5 stacks, she gains a [21% MAXHP] shield that absorbs damage for [5] seconds. Hype stacks are lost after [7s] out of combat.

Q.name: Mic Performance
Q.description: R. Mika taunts all enemies in a cone in front of her for 1.5 seconds, forcing them to attack her.

W.name: Shooting Peach
W.description: R. Mika dashes forward a short distance, knocking up every enemy hit for [0.75s] second and dealing [155% AD] physical damage.

E.name: Tag Team
E.description: R. Mika marks a partner teammate. She and her partner gains [+50%] MS for [2.5s] and the partner also gains R. Mika's Hype for the duration.

R.name: Rainbow Typhoon
R.description: R. Mika grabs an enemy and she can carry them for [1.5s]. During that, the grabbed enemy can't act but it is vulnerable. She can't grab the same enemy within [10s].

1.name: Mic Mastery
1.description: Taunted enemies take 10% more damage for the duration.

1.name: Unstoppable Force
1.description: R. Mika gains an item with 30s cooldown: When she activates it, she becomes unCCable for 4s.

1.name: Magic Shield
1.description: R.Mika gains 20% magic reduction shield which increases to 35% at LVL10.

5.name: Nadeshiko's Aid
5.description: "Tag Team" heals allies for 5% of their max HP over 5 seconds.

5.name: Hypeman
5.description: Every stack of "Hype" now also increases R. Mika's HP regeneration by 2%.

5.name: Team Spirit
5.description: "Tag Team" now gives 10% additional movement speed.

10.name: Typhoon Protection
10.description: R. Mika can't be damaged during the duration.

10.name: Thunderous Applause
10.description: Grabbed enemies take 10% more damage for the duration.

15.name: Tag Team Tactics
15.description: "Tag Team" now applies to all nearby allies.

15.name: More Hype
15.description: R. Mika can now stack up to 7 Hype.

15.name: Energized Slam
15.description: After using "Shooting Peach," R. Mika gains a 15% attack speed boost for 3 seconds.

20.name: Ultimate Showdown
20.description: Using "Rainbow Typhoon" reduces the cooldown of all of R. Mika's abilities by 3 seconds.

20.name: Spell Shield
20.description: Item: R. Mika can't be damaged by spells for 4s (100s cooldown).

20.name: Hype Overdrive
20.description: Each stack of "Hype" now also increases R. Mika's damage by 5% per stack.

20.name: Nadeshiko's Encore
20.description: Using "Tag Team" doubles R. Mika's movement speed for the duration.
